title: SPENSER CONFIDENTIAL  Ending Explained!
author: Think Story
comment: Say hi to your mother for me!
I mean, are mark Wahlberg movies in need of an ending explained? He punches some dudes, says some vaguely racist shit and roll credits
I like these kind of movies, clear camera action and just fun.

At the risk of showing how obsolete I am, I loved the 80’s tv show. Robert Urich and Avery Brooks made a great team. I especially remember how Hawk would say Spenser name. And it sounds like this remake/reboot did right by the source material.

I read the Robert B. Parker books and watched the Spenser for Hire TV show with Robert Ulrich and Avery Brooks. I could only have fun with it when I told myself this is an alternative universe! But I’m grateful for the character to still “live” through this film. Iliza had me laughing for her part. This was a pleasant surprise. Keep up the good work!
description:
In this video we take a deep dive into Netflix's latest action film Spenser Confidential starring Mark Wahlberg, Winston Duke, Post Malone and Alan Arkin and explain its ending.
